snippet.title: Cosmo's Quickstop Kick Starter Trailer
snippet.description:
Support their Kickstarter: https://goo.gl/3P2FT7

About the game: Cosmo’s Quickstop is a goofy, fast-paced, 3D animated time management game where players manage a bustling truck stop...in space. Play as Morvin, the harried manager of Route 66 Million’s most popular pitstop. Keep the vending machines stocked, the glorp rooms clean, and the hot coffee showers running and your alien customers will happily hand over Space Cash for your goods and services. But fall behind and things can get messy-- fast.

-Completely 3D animated with a colorful and hilarious “gas station in space” setting.
-An unforgettable cast of original characters, from station manager Morvin and sketchy Uncle Cosmo to your demanding alien customers.
-Fast-paced, intense, and addictive gameplay.
-Time-management style challenges, where deceptively simple mini-games snowball into a race against time to keep customers happy. -Get combos to earn even higher scores.
-Lengthy campaign mode, where players can start at the bottom and build their Quickstop back to its former glory (and beyond!)
-Many ways to customize the Quickstop, creating a multitude of ways to play. Each in-game day is different.
-Several high score game modes with varying difficulty, along with local and global leaderboards.
-Stock bloopos, get Space Cash, be the best pit stop on all of Route 66 Million.

Subscribe
http://full.sc/2aK0OG6
Discord: https://discord.gg/0wUzRi9GdnHu8Qir
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Level2GamersSTL
Podcast: http://full.sc/2fD7t8s
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/level2gamersstl
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/level2gamersstl/
Merch: https://shop.spreadshirt.com/Level2gamersstl/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Level2GamersSTL/

Intro music courtesy of Tripbuk: https://www.facebook.com/pages/KamosTripbuk/163471457043478

Animation by Eric White: 
http://erictheanimator.com
